title: Macbook AIR A1466 turns off intermittently (820-00165A)
message: I have changed the battery, it stays on for a while longer now but still just blacks out/Turns Off  randomly, can anyone help?

title: Macbook AIR A1466 turns off intermittently (820-00165A)
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Any history fault available?
Inspect board for corrosion.
Start in SMC bypass and see if still turns off in the same manner.

title: Macbook AIR A1466 turns off intermittently (820-00165A)
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 78660, member: 682"]
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Any history fault available?
Inspect board for corrosion.
Start in SMC bypass and see if still turns off in the same manner.
[/QUOTE]
Hi, thank you
the board is clean, there's no corrosion at all. I still cleaned every component.
I am sorry but what does SMC bypass mean?
like how do I bypass it?

title: Macbook AIR A1466 turns off intermittently (820-00165A)
message:
We have a lot of basic information on the forum.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-to-collection.60974/[/URL]
Many times can solve a problem just searching and reading more threads possible.

Don't forget to test with original Magsafe 2 charger; other than the actual used.

Do not quote an entire post, visible few centimeters above.
Do not click Reply button, write directly into bottom reply box.
Please, maintain forum aesthetic...

title: Macbook AIR A1466 turns off intermittently (820-00165A)
message: Thanks @ 2informaticos, I am gonna try bypassing the SMC today
